name: Refusal to deal
text: No person shall refuse to sell any commodity to, or to buy any commodity from, any other person or persons, when the refusal is for the purpose of compelling or inducing the other person or persons to agree to or engage in acts which, if acceded to, are prohibited by other sections of this chapter. [L 1961, c 190, §4; Supp, §205A-4; HRS ]
